member.name: T:Abatab.Abatab
member.summary: The main Abatab project. This is where the magic starts!

member.name: M:Abatab.Abatab.GetVersion
member.summary: Returns the current version of Abatab.
member.remarks: * This method is required by Avatar. * The version number is always the version that is in development. For example, while developing v1.0, this will return 1.0.

member.name: M:Abatab.Abatab.RunScript(NTST.ScriptLinkService.Objects.OptionObject2015,System.String)
member.summary: Executes script parameter request from Avatar, then returns a potentially modified OptionObject to Avatar.
member.remarks: This method is required by Avatar.
member.param: The original OptionObject sent from Avatar.
The original Script Parameter request from Avatar.

member.name: M:Abatab.Roundhouse.ParseRequest(AbatabData.Session)
member.summary: Determines where a script parameter request should go.
member.param: Information/data for this session of Abatab.

member.name: M:Abatab.Roundhouse.ModQuickMedOrderExecute(AbatabData.Session)
member.summary: Allow verified users to execute ModQuickMedOrder functionality.
member.param: Information/data for this session of Abatab.

member.name: M:Abatab.WebConfig.Load
member.returns: A dictionary containing the settings from Web.config.
